response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire a remarkable product that holds significant value for both of us. Considering its worth to you and my valuation of it, I propose a purchase price of $1,200,000. This offer aims to be mutually beneficial, providing you with a substantial return on your investment while ensuring a fair profit for me. I believe this price reflects the quality and potential of the product, and I look forward to discussing this further with you. Should you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to contact me. I am here to facilitate a smooth negotiation process. Best regards, Alice.", "product_price": 1200000}
